titles: A brieue admonition vnto the nowe made ministers of Englande wherein is shewed some of the fruicte of this theyr late framed fayth: made by Lewys Euans student in Louain. 24. Aug. 1565.
author: Evans, Lewis, fl. 1574.
notes: Running title reads: An admonition vnto the nowe made ministers of Englande.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Church of England --  Clergy --  Early works to 1800.
